meanings.definition: The part of the mind that acts as a self-critical conscience
meanings.sent1: Her superegos reminded her to think before speaking.
meanings.sent2: His superegos guided him to always do the right thing.
meanings.sent3: The superegos in her mind seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: His superegos was like a strict teacher, always pointing out his mistakes.
meanings.sent5: The superegos whispered warnings of caution in her thoughts.

meanings.definition: The moral and ethical component of the personality, representing internalized ideals and values
meanings.sent1: Their superegos influenced their decisions based on what they believed was right.
meanings.sent2: The superegos of society shape our understanding of right and wrong.
meanings.sent3: His superegos seemed to have a never-ending list of rules to follow.
meanings.sent4: The superegos of the community acted as a moral compass for its members.
meanings.sent5: The superegos within him resonated with the values he held dear.
